## Simple rough plotting is useful when starting with new data

&nbsp;

You only need to know the specific syntax for your language!

&nbsp;

\begincols
  \begincol{.48\textwidth}
  
  base package plotting in R is helpful
  
  `plot()`
  
  `boxplot()`
  
  `barplot()`
  
  \endcol
  \begincol{.48\textwidth}
  
  pandas has some very simple plotting functions based on matplotlib
  
  seaborn seems useful too; need to learn functions, but straightforward once you know them
  
  \endcol
\endcols
